item.title: How do u set commands as an emote?
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“whip”)
{
addItem(4151, 1);
sendMessage(“j00 got a whip”);
}

Next search for Think Emote

Make it look like this

			                            case 162: // think emote
			if(emotes == 0)
			{
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x359;
				updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			else
			{
			customCommand("whip");
			}
			break;

OK NOW SEARCH FOR update();

ADD THIS UNDER IT

Code:
sendFrame126("@red@whip", 178);

tht puts u a whip -.-
[br][size=1]Posted at: September 30, 2006, 03:36:10 PM[/size][hr]lol ;D
